Posts.Content:
TI am having stereotactic biopsy in 2 days ... So glad yours was ok .... Gives me more hope
Take care xx
Posts.Title: I need a stereotactic biopsy

Posts.Content: Hi I am new here but from what I have read gives me some hope I won't get the worst news on Tuesday am in the uk and literally from mentioning a sore breast to my gp to getting an examination , mammogram , ultrasound and the news that a 14 mm cluster of micro calcifications has been found and I am having a biopsy on Tuesday 28th of August. On Tuesday will be just under 3 weeks .... I am amazed I have been seen and diagnosed so quickly and slightly concerned with the speed I am getting the biopsy that it's bad....even had the cancer nurse who gave me the mammogram phone me yesterday to make sure I was turning up on Tuesday and did I have any questions .... My main worry is the amount of maternal relatives who have had breast cancer and only one has survived. Sorry for throwing this all out in my first post. Just glad so many of the posts I read through were benign and others have had breast cancer and recovered
Posts.Title: 14mm cluster of microcalcifications breast biopsy in 4 days

Posts.Content:
Hi ALcie, biopsy was good and bad, went in they said I was going to have 4 magnified mammos and if they showed up ok I wouldn't need the biopsy.. Had those then of course I needed the biopsy... And am now still waiting for results ...
 Thank you so much for asking 
Helen xx
Posts.Title: 14mm cluster of microcalcifications breast biopsy in 4 days

Posts.Content:
Ummm well I want to reply but my news isn't good ..... I too have have had cysts in my left breast ... Removed 15 years ago age 32 . Now for the last 6 months had left breast pain getting worse. I put it down to another fibromyalgia symptom but it just got worse. Went to my gp he examined my breast said he couldn't feel anything but referred me to breast clinic. I am in the uk not sure where you are. The referral to seeing the clinc took just over a week was surprised at the speed... Was examined dr very happy saw and felt no sign of lumps sent me upstairs for mammogram just to be sure . Had mammogram sent straight into another room for ultrasound exam got dressed made my way back to dr who was looking surprised and said .. Good and bad news right breast is fine left breast ( the one with pain 14mm cluster of microcalcifications) am off for a deeper mammogram and biopsy on Tuesday so that will be 3 weeks since mentioning it to my dr to having a biopsy ... Even had one of the cancer nurses from the hospital phone me to confirm I had the letter and was coming and was there anything I wanted to ask .... Which has made me very suspicious that this isn't going to be a good result. If you have pain go back to your gp and insist that tests are redone and ask for an ultrasound I am on reflux meds and anti depressants for my fibromyalgia and no one has suggested this is the cause. Sorry for the negative reply but please try again with your gp
Good luck xx
Posts.Title: 10 months of left breast pain, now spreading to back and worsening

Posts.Content: Just a quick question do you have ay other illnesses ... I have fibromyalgia and chostocondritis in my chest. have had 11 ops over the last 20 years and after every op my nerves around the op go into over drive can't stand anything touching the area .. Nightmare unless you are a naturist... Am in chronic pain for weeks and my scars don't Heal well my gallbladder scar is 7 years old and is still raised purple andlumpy and still I have days when it is sore to touch. I have to have a biopsy for breast cancer on Tuesday. If I get a positive result for bc am dreading treatment more than the cancer as I am super sensitive to many meds and if I have to have op I know the pain will be horrendous for me. Hope you find out what your pain is and get something for it good luck xx
Posts.Title: post breast therapy pain

Posts.Content: Helen Yorkshire uk 47 having stereotactic biopsy in 2 days... Other illnesses ... Fybromyalgia , chosochondritis ibs osteo arthritis... Don't want or need breast cancer on top of these, as husband has incurable lung disease and son is autistic....
